anastruc_1.description: Number of structures to be analysed after iteration 1

calcdesolv.description: Calculate explicit desolvation energy (note this will double the cpu requirements)

clust_meth.description: Clustering method (RMSD or Fraction of Common Contacts (FCC))

clust_rmsd.description: RMSD cutoff for clustering? (Recommended values: RMSD 7.5, FCC 0.75)

cmrest.description: Do you want to define center of mass restraints to enforce contact between the molecules? Note that these are only active during it0 and it1

cool1_steps.description: Number of MD steps during first rigid body cooling stage

cool2_steps.description: Number of MD steps during second cooling stage with flexible side-chains at interface

cool3_steps.description: Number of MD steps during third cooling stage with fully flexible interface

create_narestraints.description: Generate DNA/RNA backbone, sugar pucker and WC-pairing restraints

crossdock.description: Cross-dock all combinations in the ensembles of starting structures? Turn off this option if you only want to dock structure 1 of ensemble A. to structure 1 of ensemble B, structure 2 to structure 2, etc.

db_method.description: Which propensity database to use? statistical: based on an analysis of water-mediated contacts in the PDB, kyte-doolittle: based on the Kyte-Doolittle hydrophobicity scale

dihedflag.description: Do you want to include dihedral angle energy terms?

dist_hb.description: Cutoff distance (proton-acceptor) to define an hydrogen bond

dist_nb.description: Cutoff distance (carbon-carbon) to define an hydrophobic contact

dnap_water_tokeep.description: this is the fraction of interface water involving DNA phoshpates after the initial rigid body docking that will be kept. (note that more waters might be removed if the interaction energy is unfavorable)

elecflag_0.description: Include electrostatic during rigid body docking (it0)?

epsilon.description: Give the epsilon constant for the electrostatic energy term? Note that for explicit solvent refinement cdie with epsilon=1 is used

fcc_ignc.description: Chain-Agnostic Algorithm (used for FCC clustering in symmetrical complexes)

firstwater.description: Do you want to refine your docking models in explicit solvent?

iniseed.description: Initial seed for random number generator

initiosteps.description: Number of MD steps for rigid body high temperature TAD

inter_rigid.description: Number of MD steps during first rigid body cooling stage

kcont.description: Force constant for center of mass restraints

keepwater.description: Write additional PDB files including solvent?

krg.description: Force constant for radius of gyration restraint

ksurf.description: Force constant for surface contact restraints

ncvpart.description: Number of partitions for random exclusion (%excluded=100/number of partitions)?

noecv.description: Do you want to randomly exclude a fraction of the ambiguous restraints (AIRs)?

ntrials.description: Number of trials for rigid body minimisation?

auto_his.description: Use automatic definition of histidine protonation states?

auto_passive.description: Automatically define passive restraints as neighbours of active restraints

auto_his.description: Use automatic definition of histidine protonation states?

par_nonbonded.description: Specify the type of non-bonded interaction

ranair.description: Do you want to define randomly ambiguous interaction restraints from accessible residues? Only residues in the defined flexible segments will be considered. Note that this option is exclusive with any other distance restraints and only for it0

rgrest.description: Do you want to define a radius of gyration restraint (e.g. from SAXS)?

rgsele.description: Atom selections for the radius of gyration restraint

rigidtrans.description: Allow translation in rigid body minimisation?

rotate180_0.description: Sample 180 degrees rotated solutions during rigid body EM?

rotate180_1.description: Sample 180 degrees rotated solutions during semi-flexible SA?

skip_struc.description: It is possible to skip structures in the selection of structure in it0

smoothing.description: Perform smoothed-scoring selection for rigid-body docking solutions?

solvate_method.description: which method to use for solvating? db: database-based (recommended), restraints: for restrained solvating to amino-acid most often forming water mediated contacts and blank (''): for uniform waterlayer

solvent.description: Which solvent do you want to use?

ssdihed.description: Automatically define backbone dihedral angle restraints from structure?

structures_0.description: Number of structures for rigid body docking

surfrest.description: Do you want to define surface contact restraints to enforce contact between the molecules? Note that these are only active during it0 and it1

tadfinal1_t.description: Final temperature after first cooling step

tadfinal2_t.description: Finale temperature after second cooling step

tadfinal3_t.description: Finale temperature after third cooling step

tadhigh_t.description: Temperature for rigid body high temperature TAD

tadinit1_t.description: Initial temperature for rigid body first TAD cooling step

tadinit2_t.description: Initial temperature for second TAD cooling step with flexible side-chain at the inferface

tadinit3_t.description: Initial temperature for third TAD cooling step with fully flexible interface

tot_amb.description: Define the number of AIR restraints for automated weighting

tot_unamb.description: Define the number of distance restraints for automated weighting

transwater.description: Allows translation of water molecules during rigid-body docking, true or false:

w_bsa.description: Scoring function weight for BSA parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_cdih.description: Scoring function weight for cdih parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_dani.description: Scoring function weight for dani parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_deint.description: Scoring function weight for deint parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_desolv.description: Scoring function weight for dsolv parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_dist.description: Scoring function weight for dist parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_elec.description: Scoring function weight for elec parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_rg.description: Scoring function weight for rg parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_sani.description: Scoring function weight for SANI parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_sym.description: Scoring function weight for sym parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_vdw.description: Scoring function weight for VdW parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_vean.description: Scoring function weight for VEAN parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_xpcs.description: Scoring function weight for XPCS parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

w_xrdc.description: Scoring function weight for XRDC parameter in it0, it1 and W respectivly

water_randfrac.description: Random fraction to be added to the fraction of water to keep

water_restraint_cutoff.description: Cutoff for restraints solvating method. Upper distance limit for defining distance restraints between water and amino-acids often found to be involved in water-mediated contacts

water_restraint_initial.description: Initial cutoff for restraints solvating method all waters further away from a highly occuring water solvated residue will be removed in the generation of the initial solvation shell

water_restraint_scale.description: Force constant for restrainted solvating method

water_surfcutoff.description: Water-protein surface-cutoff. Waters further away than this cutoff distance from any component of the complex will be removed

water_tokeep.description: Fraction of water to keep. This is the fraction of all interface water after the initial rigid body docking that will be kept (note that more waters might be removed if the interaction energy is unfavorable

watercoolsteps.description: number of steps for cooling phase (300, 200, 100K)?

waterensemble.description: Number of different initial solvation shells to generate

waterheatsteps.description: Number of steps for heating phase (100, 200, 300K)?

waterrefine.description: Number of structures for the explicit solvent refinement

watersteps.description: Number of steps for 300K sampling phase?
